name: Rocknclimb
body:
### Welcome to Rocknclimb Project.
This project made in order to support the local boulder place of the DAV Bamberg. The idea was to build a living place were enthusiastic people could share and search new boulder problems. It should also allow to rank and discuss the problems in the boulder room. For the first seasion we are proud to have over 40 people who built a profile on the page and over 150 problems gathered so far. Visit the webside [here](http://rocknclimb.de/):
```
http://rocknclimb.de/.
```
We also introduced a highscore to compete against other members while the leading member currently finished over 110 boulder.  

### Implementation Overview
The system is build using a mix of PHP and Javascript. The application is supported by JQuery and JQuery Mobile in order to give it a polished view on mobile devices. Ajax calls fetch the data from the server using PHP handlers in a more or less RESTfull way. The serverside PHP is only a very thin and lightweight data-layer from and to the database (currently mysql). The returning JSON is fetched by a viewmodel used for the binding to the view. For the Binding Knockout.js is used. In the end JQuery Mobile renders the Page.

Framework used for the implementation are:
```
KnockoutJs
JQuery
JQuery Mobile
```

### Authors and Contributors
Currently we is only me @rockgobo. I am developing in my freetime and on my own. Also new requirements and wishes come also from the community using the web application. 

### Support or Contact
Have any further questions feel free to contact me christian.matyas@gmail.com
